description: System-generated unique identifier for a single enumeration record used by application logic and joins.
Identifier of the owning module or table the enumeration applies to (the entity where the attribute resides).
Name of the attribute within the referenced entity that uses this enumeration (the enumerated field).
Sort position controlling display or processing order of values within the enumeration list for the attribute.
Numeric code representing the value for programmatic use (bitmask/flag), allowing filtering or combinations; exact encoding may vary; confirm with SME.
User-facing label for the enumeration value, intended for localization and translation.
